GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with an article by its id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments for the given article_id

PUSH /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with the newly added article

exampleResponse.body: I can't think of a good comment
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
